title: Mini-Ep 293: Cheek to Thigh Coverage
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 293: Cheek to Thigh Coverage
description:
Kate takes a quick afternoon nap to stick it to the productivity-man and Doree has some strong pop culture opinions that emerge during a Bridgerton convo. Then, an impassioned listener calls in newly onboard with butt care as self care, someone writes in to ask how to get rid of toe fungus, and a listener wants to know about K+D’s eyebrow routine. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
